column5: Hi All.... I just got a boat and this will be the first time i will be going in water on a boat. I have been shore fishing for a while but never on a boat. Can someone advise me a good location to go around GTA. I dont want to go far on the first few trips.  Thanks in advance.  HIMTI
what kinda boat?  i dont recomend a dinghy on eerie in heavy SW winds
Rice lake has been producing well this year. Only a little over an hour away.  Mike

16' bass boat. One of my friend said that area around Ontario place is good but he was not sure of i would need a Harbor License for this. Fishing derby for Salmon is also on in Lake Ontario...... Do you think that this boat is OK to go in there?
yes a harbour licence is needed......   always could try simcoe......fish cooks bay.....nice and close......   good luck and congrads
i would say try cooks bay on simcoe its a bit more protected then the main lake and if its calm you can head out for some monster smallies.  Congrats of the new boat!  Cheers!
